title: 为什么forge安装完了，打不开游戏，我是正版
author: yu7868
txt_content:
我安装了一个forge，但是打不开了，每次打开都显示错误。
图片发不了我复制

信息: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker

2014-08-18 08:27:09 [信息] [ForgeModLoader] Found valid fingerprint for Minecraft Forge. Certificate fingerprint e3c3d50c7c986df74c645c0ac54639741c90a557
2014-08-18 08:27:09 [严重] [ForgeModLoader] The minecraft jar file:/C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/.minecraft/versions/1.6.4-Forge9.11.1.965/1.6.4-Forge9.11.1.965.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT, it is highly unlikely minecraft will work! STOP NOW, get a clean copy and try again!
2014-08-18 08:27:09 [严重] [ForgeModLoader] For your safety, FML will not launch minecraft. You will need to fetch a clean version of the minecraft jar file
2014-08-18 08:27:09 [严重] [ForgeModLoader] Technical information: The class net.minecraft.client.ClientBrandRetriever should have been associated with the minecraft jar file, and should have returned us a valid, intact minecraft jar location. This did not work. Either you have modified the minecraft jar file (if so run the forge installer again), or you are using a base editing jar that is changing this class (and likely others too). If you REALLY want to run minecraft in this configuration, add the flag -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true to the 'JVM settings' in your launcher profile.

replies.author: yu7868
replies.txt_content:
mot321 发表于 2014-8-18 09:17
在java中加入-Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true參數避開驗證
怎么加入QAQ
